name: Tda-mapper-py
tagline: A straightforward implementation of the mapper construction by Carlsson--Memoli--Singh. (I wrote a little blog post about it at http://mapsfunctionsandarrows.blogspot.de)
body:
# TDA-Mapper-py

A straightforward implementation of the mapper construction by Carlsson--Memoli--Singh. I wrote a little blog post about it at http://mapsfunctionsandarrows.blogspot.de
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
